headline: Eastman Chemical (EMN): Valuation in Focus Following S&P Outlook Downgrade and Mounting Sector Challenges
summary: S&P Global Ratings recently shifted Eastman Chemical (EMN) to a Negative outlook, shining a spotlight on mounting challenges. Trade pressures, softening demand, and management’s withdrawal of full-year guidance are fueling questions about the company’s near-term financial direction. See our latest analysis for Eastman Chemical. After a challenging summer marked by a drop from the FTSE All-World Index and S&P’s outlook downgrade, Eastman Chemical’s share price has struggled to recover. Shares...
